Bicycle-powered water pump: Attach a water pump to the rear wheel of the bicycle, and pedal to pump water.
Bicycle-powered generator: Attach a generator to the rear wheel of the bicycle, and pedal to generate electricity.
Bicycle-powered washing machine: Attach a washing machine to the rear wheel of the bicycle, and pedal to generate power to wash clothes.
Bicycle-powered refrigerator: Attach a refrigerator to the rear wheel of the bicycle, and pedal to generate power to keep food cool.
Bicycle-powered oven: Attach an oven to the rear wheel of the bicycle, and pedal to generate power to cook food.
